title: Vaccination may reduce the severity of the flu in vaccinated but still infected patients

title_detail.value: Vaccination may reduce the severity of the flu in vaccinated but still infected patients

summary: When influenza vaccination is ineffective in preventing the flu, it could have an additional effect reducing the severity of the infection, according to an epidemiological study.

summary_detail.value: When influenza vaccination is ineffective in preventing the flu, it could have an additional effect reducing the severity of the infection, according to an epidemiological study.
